name: Win Condition
_source: s;Simon;Time to head deeper into the mountains.
s;Melodie;You held your own back there, stranger.{w}{br}You and your group are a real force of destruction.
s;Melodie;So, who are you anyways? What're you doing this deep into the mountains?
s;Simon;Call me Simon.{w}{br}My group and I are looking to deal with the dragonlord... somehow.
s;Melodie;Argh, that dragon.{w}{br}All those people following it mindlessly.{w}{br}Submitting to an uncaring leader who only cares about power and its appetite.
s;Simon;Really, we're mostly just concerned with its threat to the surrounding land.{w}{br}We're looking to restore some order to the area.
s;Melodie;Order! Ha!{w}{br}You don't give people enough credit, Simon.{w}{br}People thrive in chaos.{w} So-called "order" merely restricts their freedom.
s;Melodie;Make it easier on yourselves and others:{w} kill the dragon, leave people be.
s;Simon;You make it sound so simple...
s;Melodie;It's not so hard. My tribe has existed for centuries with few rules and respect for freedom.
s;Simon;Things are a bit more complicated than that.
s;Simon;Look, Melodie, I'm not sure we'll see eye-to-eye here.
s;Melodie;That's fine. Just don't go messing with me or others, and we'll get along perfectly.{w}{br}And hey, it seems like we have a similar objective for now.{w}{br}So let's press on.{w} After you.
